mapper.select: select q.id,q.title,q.description,q.tag,q.creator,q.gmt_create,q.gmt_modified,q.comment_count,q.view_count,q.like_count, u.id uid,u.account,u.name,u.token,u.intro,u.gmt_create u_gmt_create,u.gmt_modified u_gmt_modified,u.avatar_url from tb_question q ,tb_user u where q.creator=u.id
mapper.update: update tb_question set view_count = view_count + 1 where id = #{questionId}
update tb_question set comment_count = comment_count + #{commentCount} where id = #{questionId}
